actions.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Rend

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) acid damage.
actions.name: Acid Spit

languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak
name: Wasteland Dragonnel [DSDQ]

specialTraits.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
specialTraits.name: Flyby
